unit.data.cardinal.name: Cardinal
unit.data.cardinal.lore: Cardinals spend their time studying the <style="value">Fire</style> magic scrolls in the Temples libraries. There they also learned basic martial art techniques making them deadly with and without magic.
unit.data.cardinal.description.visuals: Bald serious-looking man. Wearing a monk-like multi-layered outift lined with gold. A large circular pendant around his neck covered by a red scarf. He is holding a long magic staff with a spade tip, a red jewel in the center. The staff is emitting a large amount of light and lightning.
